title: Environmental Parameter Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of environmental parameters, pollutants, analytes, and measured environmental indicators.

terms.label: Greenhouse Gas
terms.definition: A greenhouse gas parameter such as carbon dioxide, methane, nitrous oxide, or fluorinated gases.

terms.label: Criteria Air Pollutant
terms.definition: A regulated air pollutant such as ozone, particulate matter (PM2.5, PM10), sulfur dioxide, nitrogen dioxide, carbon monoxide, or lead.

terms.label: Hazardous Air Pollutant
terms.definition: A hazardous air pollutant (HAP) such as benzene, formaldehyde, mercury, or other toxics regulated for health impacts.

terms.label: Nutrient
terms.definition: A nutrient parameter such as nitrogen, phosphorus, nitrate, ammonia, or related compounds relevant to water quality.

terms.label: Metal or Heavy Metal
terms.definition: A metal or heavy metal parameter such as lead, mercury, cadmium, chromium, or arsenic measured in environmental media.

terms.label: Organic Compound
terms.definition: An organic compound parameter such as VOCs, PAHs, pesticides, solvents, or other carbon-based chemical analytes.

terms.label: Physical Indicator
terms.definition: A physical environmental parameter such as temperature, turbidity, pH, dissolved oxygen, or conductivity.

terms.label: Other Environmental Parameter
terms.definition: A parameter type not covered by another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
